constantValues: The root entity for portal Ideas.

constantValues: Shows whether the idea forum is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

members.description: Shows whether the idea forum is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.
